description: This file contains API client functions for interacting with a backend server, including methods for fetching data, uploading files, and generating URLs for reports and artifacts. It primarily defines functions wrapping fetch API calls to specific REST endpoints related to jobs and artifacts.

methods.name: apiFetch(path, { method = 'GET', headers = {}, body, isForm = false, signal } = {})
methods.description: A wrapper around fetch to handle JSON parsing, error reporting, and URL prefixing.

methods.name: uploadJob(file)
methods.description: Uploads a file to create a new job, returning the job ID.

methods.name: listJobs()
methods.description: Retrieves a list of current jobs with their statuses.

methods.name: getJobArtifacts(jobId)
methods.description: Fetches artifacts associated with a specific job.

methods.name: getArtifactDownloadUrl(jobId, artifactName)
methods.description: Constructs and returns a direct download URL for a specific artifact.

methods.name: triggerGenerate(jobId)
methods.description: Triggers a generation step for a specified job.

methods.name: triggerExecute(jobId)
methods.description: Triggers an execution step for a specified job.

methods.name: getAllureReportUrl(jobId)
methods.description: Constructs a URL to access the Allure report for a given job.

ctags.name: apiFetch
ctags.pattern: /^export async function apiFetch(path, { method = 'GET', headers = {}, body, isForm = false, signa/
ctags.signature: (path, { method = 'GET', headers = {}, body, isForm = false, signal } = {})
